General.Name: Formosa Prosonic Industries
General.Description: Formosa Prosonic Industries Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and markets speaker system products in Malaysia. The company offers wireless speakers; conventional speaker products, including home audio, home theatre audio, speaker unit, and plastic injection products, as well as custom installation services; and musical instruments, such as pianos, guitar amplifiers, and drums. It also provides original equipment manufacturing and original design manufacturing services for woodworking, plastic injection, driver units, and PCB assembly and finished-products assembly, as well as speaker driver units. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Port Klang, Malaysia.
